description: AI-integrated web app that fetches movie details via OMDb API and provides Gemini-powered movie recommendations.

title: Full-Stack Retail Management System

title: CampusConnect – Student Companion iOS App

title: Police Entity Microservice

title: Plushie Item Microservice

title: Spring Boot Book Review App
description: A web application for managing book reviews with user authentication.

title: ShapeAnimator
